TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AccessibleStates extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies values representing possible states for an accessible object.

span.span: Specifies values representing possible states for an accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可存取的物件可以與一或多個這些狀態產生關聯。An accessible object can be associated with one or more of these states. 如需協助工具應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 在 Microsoft Developer Network (MSDN) 文件庫中的 「 Microsoft Active Accessibility" http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about the accessibility application, see "Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the Microsoft Developer Network (MSDN) library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立可存取性感知的圖表控制，請使用和類別會公開可存取的資訊。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製兩條曲線，以及一個圖例。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，用於方法以提供圖表控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不是根據實際控制，但改為繪製所 chart 控制項中，它不包含任何內建的可存取資訊。Because the chart legend is not an actual control based on , but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not contain any built-in accessible information. 因為這個緣故，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別覆寫方法以傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示每個部分的圖例可存取的資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供必要的可存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼摘錄示範如何使用列舉型別屬性。This code excerpt demonstrates using the enumeration with the property. 請參閱類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates AlertHigh = int32(268435456)
AlertHigh = 268435456

summary.span: The important information that should be conveyed to the user immediately.

span.span: The important information that should be conveyed to the user immediately.

summary.span: For example, a battery-level indicator reaching a critical low level would transition to this state, in which case, a blind access utility would announce this information immediately to the user, and a screen magnification program would scroll the screen so that the battery indicator is in view.

span.span: For example, a battery-level indicator reaching a critical low level would transition to this state, in which case, a blind access utility would announce this information immediately to the user, and a screen magnification program would scroll the screen so that the battery indicator is in view.

summary.span: This state is also appropriate for any prompt or operation that must be completed before the user can continue.

span.span: This state is also appropriate for any prompt or operation that must be completed before the user can continue.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates AlertLow = int32(67108864)
AlertLow = 67108864

summary.span: The low-priority information that might not be important to the user.

span.span: The low-priority information that might not be important to the user.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates AlertMedium = int32(134217728)
AlertMedium = 134217728

summary.span: The important information that does not need to be conveyed to the user immediately.

span.span: The important information that does not need to be conveyed to the user immediately.

summary.span: For example, when a battery-level indicator is starting to reach a low level, it could generate a medium-level alert.

span.span: For example, when a battery-level indicator is starting to reach a low level, it could generate a medium-level alert.

summary.span: Blind access utilities could then generate a sound to let the user know that important information is available, without actually interrupting the user's work.

span.span: Blind access utilities could then generate a sound to let the user know that important information is available, without actually interrupting the user's work.

summary.span: Users can then query the alert information any time they choose.

span.span: Users can then query the alert information any time they choose.

Animated = 16384

span.span: This state should not be used to indicate that the object's location is changing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates ExtSelectable = int32(33554432)
ExtSelectable = 33554432

summary.span: The altered selection such that all objects between the selection anchor, which is the object with the keyboard focus, and this object take on the anchor object's selection state.

span.span: The altered selection such that all objects between the selection anchor, which is the object with the keyboard focus, and this object take on the anchor object's selection state.

summary.span: If the anchor object is not selected, the objects are removed from the selection.

span.span: If the anchor object is not selected, the objects are removed from the selection.

summary.span: If the anchor object is selected, the selection is extended to include this object and all objects in between.

span.span: If the anchor object is selected, the selection is extended to include this object and all objects in between.

summary.span: You can set the selection state by combining this with or .

span.span: You can set the selection state by combining this with or .

summary.span: This state does not change the focus or the selection anchor unless it is combined with .

span.span: This state does not change the focus or the selection anchor unless it is combined with .
